Header: Forward Maintenance Area - North Central Greets New Wanni Commander
Content: Major General Jagath Gunawardena, Commander Security Forces - Wanni as part of his familiarization assignment visited the Forward Maintenance Area (FMA North Central) on Friday (02) and received an update on the role and tasks of the FMA. During the visit, he was warmly received by the Commander Forward Maintenance Area -North Central, Major General K.M.R.P Karunathilake and greeted to a Guard Turnout. Then, he addressed a cross section of the troops serving the FMA and subsequently joined an all rank tea. Afterwards, he added memories by planting a Sandalwood (Sandun) sapling in the camp premises to mark his visit. Afterwards he received an update in relevance to the responsibilities of this logistic establishment in the Wanni area. Senior Officers, Battalion Commanders and many Other Ranks were present during the programme.
